comments:
In the orm.xml file there is an Embedded mapping that points to an Embeddable with several attributes.  While running validation this ClassCastException occurs:
*** ERROR ***: Mon May 21 13:07:36 EDT 2007    java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.orm.XmlEmbedded
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaEObject.getRoot(JavaEObject.java:72)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaEObject.getRoot(JavaEObject.java:72)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaEObject.getJpaFile(JavaEObject.java:68)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaEObject.getResource(JavaEObject.java:77)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.validation.JpaHelper.getResource(JpaHelper.java:26)
at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.WorkbenchReporter.getMessageResource(WorkbenchReporter.java:417)
at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.WorkbenchReporter.addMessage(WorkbenchReporter.java:520)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.validation.JpaValidator.validateInJob(JpaValidator.java:40)
at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJob.java:65)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
This can prevent the appropriate error messages from displaying.  Updated for PMC approval.
